ItemFilterRegex.Name: The Culling of Stratholme
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: (?<! Heroic )Culling of Stratholme(?<! Heroic)|(?<! Heroic )The Culling of Stratholme(?<! Heroic)

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Dungeons
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: (?<! Heroic (The )?)Oculus|(?<! Heroic )Azjol-Nerub|(?<! Heroic )Ahn'kahet|(?<! Heroic )Drak'Tharon|(?<! Heroic )Gundrak|(?<! Heroic (The )?)Culling of Stratholme|(?<! Heroic (The )?)Nexus|(?<! Heroic (The )?)Violet Hold|(?<! Heroic )Halls of Lightning|(?<! Heroic )Halls of Stone|(?<! Heroic )Utgarde Keep|(?<! Heroic )Utgarde Pinnacle|(?<! Heroic )Trial of the Champion

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Dungeons (Heroic)
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Heroic (The )?Oculus|Heroic Azjol-Nerub|Heroic Ahn'kahet|Heroic Drak'Tharon|Heroic Gundrak|Heroic (CoT: )?Stratholme|Heroic (The )?Nexus|Heroic (The )?Violet Hold|Heroic Halls of Lightning|Heroic Halls of Stone|Heroic Utgarde Keep|Heroic Utgarde Pinnacle|Heroic Trial of the Champion

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Military Quarter
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Instructor Razuvious|Gothik the Harvester|The Four Horsemen|Four Horsemen Chest

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Military Quarter
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Instructor Razuvious|Gothik the Harvester|The Four Horsemen|Four Horsemen Chest

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Tier 9 Raids (10)
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Trial of the Crusader \(10\)|Koralon the Flame Watcher

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Factions & Vendors
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Friendly|Honored|Revered|Exalted|Duchess Mynx|Archmage Alvareaux|Cielstrasza|Tanak|Geen|Veteran Crusader Aliocha Segard|Lillehoff|Horde Expedition|Kalu'ak|Logistics Officer Brighton|Alliance Vanguard

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Burning Crusade
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Sunwell|Yrma|Theremis|Tydormu|Black Temple|Hyjal|Veynna Dawnstar|Tempest Keep|Serpentshrine Cavern|Zul'Aman|G'eras|Anwehu|Badge of Justice|Asuur|Karazhan|Gruul's Lair|Magtheridon's Lair|Old Hillsbrad Foothills|Blood Furnace|Slave Pens|Arcatraz|Underbog|Shattered Halls|Hellfire Ramparts|Magisters' Terrace|Auchenai Crypts|Shadow Labyrinth|Sethekk Halls|Steamvault|Mana-Tombs|Botanica|Mechanar|Black Morass|Spirit Shard|Forgotten Vanquisher

ItemFilterRegex.Name: PVP
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Points|Mark of Honor|Hall of Legends|Champions' Hall|Griz Gutshank|Argex Irongut|Travis Day|Nargle Lashcord|Blazzek the Biter|Ecton Brasstumbler|Lady Palanseer|Doris Volanthius|Evee Copperspring

ItemFilterRegex.Name: ALL (this must be off for other filters to work)
